      • createNewMedia

        void createNewMedia(java.lang.String mediaName,
                    java.lang.String topic,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.String uriImgLogo,
                    java.lang.String pdfUri,
                    int price,
                    int publicationInMonth)
        Create new Media object.
        Parameters:
        mediaName - - Media name
        topic - - topic of Media (like NEWS,CULINARY, SPORT)
        description - - Media description
        uriImgLogo - - name of image file which has a logotype of Media role
        pdfUri - - name of PDF file. This PDF file contain scan of Media last edition
        price - - price of Media
        publicationInMonth - - quantity publications in month

      • updateMediaImageLogoUriService

        void updateMediaImageLogoUriService(java.lang.String imgLogoUri,
                                    int mediaId,
                                    javax.servlet.http.Part part,
                                    java.lang.String pathToCreate,
                                    java.nio.file.Path pathToDelete)
        Update image (logo of Media). Update in DB and in project. Firstly upload image-file after delete old logo image file after put a new name to DB.
        Parameters:
        imgLogoUri - - new name of image
        mediaId - - id of Media
        part - - file uploaded from WEB-interface
        pathToCreate - - path where we put new image file
        pathToDelete - - path where we need to delete old image file

      • updateMediaPdfUriService

        void updateMediaPdfUriService(java.lang.String pdfUri,
                              int mediaId,
                              javax.servlet.http.Part part,
                              java.lang.String pathToCreate,
                              java.nio.file.Path pathToDelete)
        Update PDF-file of Media. Update in DB and in project. Firstly upload PDF-file after delete old PDF-file after put a new name to DB.
        Parameters:
        pdfUri - - new name of PDF file
        mediaId - - id of Media
        part - - file uploaded from WEB-interface
        pathToCreate - - path where we put new PDF file
        pathToDelete - - path where we need to delete old PDF file
